item.description:
Enjoy the soft, relaxing, and entertaining music by Dan Chauvin. I'll be there around 6:15 pm. Afterwards we'll go out to eat at Ruby Tuesdays. Dan plays from 6:30 - 8:30 pm.

Grab a coffee in the book store cafe if you like and bring it with you to the performance located in the function room towards the back of the store.

Daniel blends the traditional folk sounds of his New England roots with more contemporary rock and country influences to create an original, ear-catching, almost bluegrass finger-style acoustic work that is creatively his own.

This is a free event!
item.name: Great Music at Tatnuck with Dan Chauvin
